title: Juventus' New UCL Low
description:
The FC crew dive into Juventus' troubles after they're knocked out of the UEFA Champions League group stage for the first time since 2013. Meanwhile, Messi puts on a vintage performance in a dominant PSG win, Chelsea clinch their group with a revamped attack under Graham Potter, and Cristiano Ronaldo's future is up in the air as he returns to Man United training.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Juventus crash out of Champions League; Messi's brilliance in PSG win; Ronaldo's rocky future
